body: ok, correct myself: the preview of the "color zone by EP results" component can be turned off the **"analysisTitle"** output node should be connected to the preview component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bAnmdOW7NajCWa1Pj5dvuYq2P2WyEJecMFdfEou4OpDa6izfpc9Y05Nqu8PxxJXJhUImhjk6zlNFJH4mixr5YGIQEj0f5GgE/03.PNG)
